00001 // Mutex.cpp: implementation of the CMutex class.
00002 //
00004 
00005 
00006 #include <System/Mutex.h>
00007 #include <System/SimpleException.h>
00008 #include <System/Thread.h>
00009 
00010 using namespace Omiscid;
00011 
00013 // Construction/Destruction
00015 
00016 Mutex::Mutex()
00017 {
00018 #ifdef WIN32
00019     // mutex = CreateMutex( NULL, false, NULL );
00020     mutex = CreateSemaphore(NULL, 1, (LONG)0xffff, NULL );
00021     #ifdef DEBUG
00022         if ( mutex == NULL )
00023         {
00024             int err = GetLastError();
00025             OmiscidError( "Could not create mutex : %d\n", err );
00026         }
00027     #endif
00028 #else
00029     if ( pthread_mutex_init(&mutex, NULL) != 0 )
00030     {
00031         throw  SimpleException("Error Mutex Init");
00032     }
00033 #endif
00034 #ifdef DEBUG
00035     OwnerId = 0;
00036 #endif
00037 }
00038 
00039 Mutex::~Mutex()
00040 {
00041 #ifdef WIN32
00042     if ( mutex )
00043     {
00044         CloseHandle( mutex );
00045     }
00046 #else
00047     pthread_mutex_destroy(&mutex);
00048 #endif
00049 }
00050 
00051 bool Mutex::Lock()
00052 {
00053 #ifdef WIN32
00054     unsigned int Result = WaitForSingleObject( mutex, INFINITE );
00055     if ( Result == WAIT_OBJECT_0 )
00056     {
00057 #ifdef DEBUG
00058         // In debug mode, set the owner id
00059         OwnerId = Thread::GetThreadId();
00060 #endif
00061         // Here we go, we've got the mutex
00062         return true;
00063     }
00064 #else
00065     if( pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex) == 0 )
00066     {
00067 #ifdef DEBUG
00068         // In debug mode, set the owner id
00069         OwnerId = Thread::GetThreadId();
00070 #endif
00071         return true;
00072     }
00073 #endif
00074 
00075     return false;
00076 }
00077 
00078 bool Mutex::Unlock()
00079 {
00080 #ifdef WIN32
00081     // if ( !ReleaseMutex(mutex) )
00082     if ( !ReleaseSemaphore(mutex,1,NULL) )
00083     {
00084         return false;
00085     }
00086 #else
00087     if( pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex) != 0 )
00088     {
00089         return false;
00090     }
00091 #endif
00092 
00093 #ifdef DEBUG
00094     OwnerId = 0;
00095 #endif
00096 
00097     return true;
00098 }
